data.title: Great Chinese restaurant
data.text: Excellent food and service.  Don't miss going to this family-owned restaurant if you're ever in the southern part of the Salt Lake Valley.  Generous serving sizes.

data.title: Not my cup of tea
data.text:
We have our favorite Chinese restaurant in the area but thought we'd try China Chef for a change. 

The good was normal and the service was average. The style of Chinese they serve just wasn't the type we lke.

data.title: Good fast Chinese food
data.text: Ordered take out.  It was good and fast.  Very freindly hostess.  Price was just right.  They had the Jazz game on TV

data.title: DRIVE-THRU SERVICE
data.text: This is the first and only place I've found that has drive-thru window service. I usually call ahead and my order is always ready for pick-up. The food is good. The entrees are hot. It's right down the street from my home, so the location is very convenient.

data.title: Delicious food! Wonderful service!
data.text: We were visiting from Chicago and chose to eat dinner here, there was a buffet the night we went and everything was so good! WAY better than your typical Chinese restaurant! The wait staff was so sweet and helpful and the owners wide was a joy to talk to! We liked it so much we went back for lunch the next day!!!

data.title: Very fresh
data.text:
If I can say anything about China Chefs it would be that their food is about the freshest you will find.
The prices are good, food is fantastic and of high quality and the service is always great.
The only funny thing about China Chefs is that their iced tea is very watered down.
Give them a try!

data.title: Immaculate, delicious
data.text:
This family-owned and operated Chinese restaurant provides a clean, spacious dining room and delivers large-portioned and beautifully prepared food.  The waiter was very attentive and helpful.  

The menu is different than most Chinese restaurant, as it has, in addition to the typical selection of certain common dishes, a mix-n-match approach where one can choose what style, degree of spices, and ingredients going into a dish.

Try their wonton soup for two... enough for four easily.  The pineapple chicken is served inside an actual pineapple.  The lemon chicken is to die for!

data.title: The best Chinese food in Salt lake valley !!!!
data.text: This is place is clean , this is thier 2nd location I love the " PON -PON CHICKEN " a must to try , also Mongolian Beef , great price and values for you and your family , they even have menu for kids , I know the owner very well in fact is cleaness  food no left-over like some other chinese restrurant I promised my little boy currently 7 yr age always asked me to take him here all the time forget PF CHANGS this place is much better for the price , food and the lay out  ,I have been taking my wife and my son  here  since was open back in 2007( note * that was thier first location )  , now this location in South Jordan UT was open early this year 2011 , brand new same food taste always the same !  great place for dating couple ( prom , birthday party , celebrations , dinner , lunches  ) love the lay out ! try it you'll will love it I can't tell you and the server very polite and open on sunday!!!!
